parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the serpentine belt can cause a loss of power steering, power brakes, and other safety features, increasing the risk of accidents and making it difficult to control the vehicle.
symptoms: The serpentine belt breaks while driving
resulting in a total loss of power steering
causing the vehicle to become difficult to control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Improper installation or maintenance of belts can lead to premature failure, causing a loss of power steering, power brakes, and other safety features, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The fan belt or serpentine belt comes off while driving
resulting in a loss of power steering and brakes

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Design Flaw in Fuel Tank Valves
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A design flaw in the fuel tank valves can cause gas to leak from one tank to another, potentially leading to a fire hazard or other safety issues.
symptoms: Gas leaks from one tank to another when filling up

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake pedal can cause extended stopping distances, loss of brakes, and accidents, especially on declines.
symptoms: The brake pedal goes to the floor
the brake pedal becomes very soft

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear brakes can cause loss of brakes, accidents, and lockup of the wheels, especially on declines.
Warped brake rotors and pads can cause vibration while braking, loss of braking performance, and accidents.
The failure of the fan belt can cause loss of power steering and brakes, leading to accidents and loss of control.
symptoms: snapped bolt that holds idle pulley.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Defective Check Valve in Fuel Pump Assembly
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The defective check valve can cause fuel to overflow from one tank to another, leading to fuel spillage, which can result in a fire when exposed to an ignition source.
symptoms: fuel overflowing from one tank to another

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Fuel leaks can cause fuel to spill onto the roadway, potentially leading to a fire, and can also result in fuel loss and environmental damage.
symptoms: Fuel leaking from the front tank
fuel tank rusted and needs replacing

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Damage to the fuel line can cause fuel to leak, leading to fuel spillage and potentially resulting in a fire.
The failure of the power steering belt can cause loss of power steering and power brakes, leading to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and near-misses.
symptoms: The power assist belt comes off
causing loss of power steering and power brakes
excessive vibration of the front wheels

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering tensioner can cause the serpentine belt to slip off, leading to loss of power steering and power brakes, and loss of vehicle control.
symptoms: The bronze bushing in the tensioner wears out
causing the tension bearing surface to allow the serpentine belt to slip off
resulting in loss of power steering and power brakes

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Excessive vibration of the front wheels can affect steering proficiency, leading to loss of vehicle control and accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Tire Failure due to Belt Separation
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire failure due to belt separation can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries to occupants and other motorists.
symptoms: Tires separate at the bead joint
and lead to loss of control. In some cases
the tire may jump up and down

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Excessive wear of tires can lead to reduced traction, loss of control, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: and potentially causing loss of control.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Tire Failure due to Manufacturing Defects
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire failure due to manufacturing defects can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries to occupants and other motorists.
symptoms: causing damage to the vehicle and potentially leading to loss of control. In some cases
causing the vehicle to drift or lose control.
